title: The Gmail app won't fetch new mail
content:
The Gmail app on my Pixel 3a suddenly stopped to fetch new mail until I opened the app and pulled to refresh manually. First yesterday, I "fixed" it with the deletion of the app's data and updates, reloading the actual version followed by a fresh setup. 

That worked until this morning. The app stopped again fetching new mail until I open the app and do a manually refresh. 

There is no network issue. As my iPhone is next to me it will fetch new mail with the iOS Gmail app immediately as the new mail arrives at the server. Same goes to my Chromebook and the Gmail web version.

Only the Android Gmail app makes that trouble. 

Sadly there is no option to reach out to the apps developers, so what can we do? 

Regards
Tom
